text: Ghaytun () is a village in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. About north of the city of Aleppo and some south of Syria's border with Turkey, it is administratively part of Nahiya Akhtarin of Azaz District. Nearby localities include Akhtarin to the northeast, Ghuz to the south, and Mare' to the west. In the 2004 census, Ghaytun had a population of 1,080. ==References==
title: Ghaytun
